column4: hi! i m trying to get wpa2 running on feisty with a pcmcia orinoco cs on thinkpad t22. i get the error "ioctl[IPW_IOCTL_WPA_SUPPLICANT] : Operation not supported". does that mean that this card cant do wpa?
I don't know, the hardware may be too old to support wpa2 at all
the card itself may be too old, as far as I know orinoco is fairly old wifi hardware
